About the job
            
 
Job descriptionDive into a world of innovation with our flourishing SaaS company, Odyssee Field Service. We're currently scouting for a dynamic NL/FR Business Consultant to help customers get the most out of the Odyssee field service solutions Kick-start your career at Odyssee Field Service!The Impact You Will Make: You work together with your sales colleagues to maintain regular contact with our national and international customers. You listen to their needs, make a quick analysis and provide explanations about the Odyssee applications through personalized web demos.You ensure everyone receives the right information and you follow up the project.You also work together with the project manager and developers to implement projects and setup environments for new customers.You analyze the customer processes, you bridge the gap between their functional needs and the capabilities of the Odyssee solutions, you advise them on how to improve their field service processes.You gain an in-depth understanding of their workflow, identifying challenges, and re-evaluating field service processes. As you navigate this, maintaining consistent feedback with both the client and the project manager is imperative. You are entrusted with crafting the final documents (such as analysis, Fit-gap) that encapsulate the client's needs while aligning with the functionalities of our field service solutions.Following the technical developments, you ensure a seamless implementation of the solution and provide initial post-launch support.You work partly on-site with the customer, and partly from the (home) office. This balanced approach allows you to collaborate effectively with colleagues, account managers, and project managers to deliver excellent implementation services in various industries.
The Skills You'll Need: You hold a bachelor or master diploma in "IT" or "engineering" or any related fieldHaving between 2 or 3 years of experience in a similar jobYou have a consultancy-oriented mindset, with an ability to swiftly connect and establish trust with various stakeholders.You’re comfortable with API’s, connectors, master data, SQL querriesYou take ownership and deliver results. No need to micro-manage you, you go-getter you!You are fluent in Dutch, French and English. Other languages are welcome (The more the merrier!);You are a good, confident communicator. Your soft skills make the differenceYou have the will to have a maximum impact on Odyssee Field ServiceYou care deeply, genuinely, and are passionately concerned about the Odyssee customersExperience with enterprise software or SaaS is a plusKnowledge of field service processes is a plus
 What's In It For You? A vibrant, start-up feel work environment with a strong scale-up mentality.A competent team to surround and support you in delivering the best possible projectsA community where every input is valued.Clear career growth and development opportunities.A competitive salary and benefitsA blend of remote and office work.An exceptional work-life balance and flexible arrangements to maximize productivity and happiness
 About Odyssee Field ServiceJoin Odyssee Field Service, a growing Brussels-based SAAS scale-up. We've made our mark in the field service management solutions industry since 2008 and continue to expand.Empower field service teams and optimize machine maintenance processes for operational excellence. Our reach has now expanded beyond Europe into the USA, making us a diverse, international, and vibrant scale-up.

About the job
            
 
Wir suchen neue Senior-Mitarbeiter (m/w/d) für den Bereich Coaching & Consulting, die uns bei der Beratung & Betreuung unserer Berater, Coaches, Agenturen und weiterer Dienstleistungen helfen.Als Senior-Business-Consultant (m/w/d) arbeitest du eng mit unseren Unternehmern zusammen und setzt dich intensiv mit deren Geschäftsmodellen auseinander. Nach der Einarbeitung bist du Experte und somit direkter Ansprechpartner für sie rund um die Themen Sales, Marketing, CRM, HR, Management und Geschäftsprozesse.Aufgaben Du analysierst intensiv bestehende Unternehmensstrukturen und entwickelst ein zielführendes Konzept zur Optimierung derselben.Du betreust dein eigenes Kundenportfolio und tauschst dich regelmäßig mit deinem Team zu aktuellen Kundencases, Möglichkeiten & Schwierigkeiten aus.Du entwickelst innovative Marketing- und Vertriebsstrategien und implementierst gemeinsam mit deinen Kunden bewährte Social-Selling-Praktiken.Du kommunizierst proaktiv mit deinen Kunden und leitest 1:1-Coaching-, Onboarding- und Live-Calls mit spannenden Führungspersönlichkeiten an.Du implementierst eine CRM-Grundlage (Hubspot) für eine langfristige Zusammenarbeit.Du baust dir ein eigenes Team auf und übernimmst dabei eine führende Managementposition.Du übernimmst Verantwortung für interne Prozesse und versuchst diese eigenständig und durchdacht weiterzuentwickeln.
Qualifikation Du hast idealerweise eine abgeschlossene Berufsausbildung oder einen Bachelor-Abschluss.(Von Vorteil) Du hast eine abgeschlossene Ausbildung oder Erfahrung im Coaching.Du hast weitreichende Erfahrung in den folgenden Schwerpunkten: Strategie, Marketing, Verkauf, CRM.(Von Vorteil) Du hast bereits ein Team aufgebaut und verstehst, worauf es ankommt, Mitarbeiter einzustellen und zu führen.Du bist gewissenhaft, ordentlich und hast eine schnelle Auffassungsgabe.Du hast starke kommunikative Fähigkeiten und eine strukturierte Arbeitsweise.Du hast bereits Erfahrung im Umgang mit Social Media und LinkedIn (Erfahrung mit Hubspot ist ein Plus).Du bist sehr proaktiv und bringst gerne neue Ideen ein.Du bist eigenverantwortlich und absolut zuverlässig.Du kannst bestehenden Prozessen folgen und diese aber auch weiterentwickeln.Du möchtest nicht nur beruflich, sondern auch persönlich wachsen.
Benefits Vergütung: Überdurchschnittliches Einstiegsgehalt + Provisionsmöglichkeiten.Optimale Ausstattung: Du bekommst dein eigenes MacBook, das sowohl zum Arbeiten als auch für den privaten Gebrauch zur Verfügung gestellt wird.Eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten: Freiheit durch Eigenverantwortung – Ziele erreichen statt Zeiten absitzen.Karrierechancen: Über die nächsten Jahre werden wir weiter wachsen und expandieren. Dazu benötigen wir weitere Experten und/oder Führungskräfte.Umfangreiches Gesundheitssystem: Erhalte Zugriff auf über 300 Gesundheitsleistungen und viele weitere Benefits – sogar deine Familienangehörigen profitieren mit!Gesundheitszuschüsse: Frei verfügbares Budget für Massagen, Brillen, Arzneimittel, Heilpraktikerleistungen u. v. m.Ausgezeichnete Lage: Moderne Büroräume in Alsternähe mit exzellenter Infrastruktur und Anbindung.Kostenlose Getränke: Kaffee, Limonade, Orangensaft - alles dabei!Private Entlastung: Wir zahlen deinen Weg zur Arbeit, dein Mittagessen, die private Handyrechnung und vieles mehr.

About the job
            
 
Strategy Consultant - Dutch speaking NewForesight Consultancy is een toonaangevend en wereldwijd opererend consultancy bureau op het gebied van duurzame markt transformaties. We werken dag in dag uit aan een toekomst waarin bedrijven, organisaties en overheden de duurzame oplossing kiezen. We zijn op zoek naar een Strategy Consultant voor het TransMission domein die gelooft in duurzame oplossingen en hier vol passie mee aan de slag wil.Waarom zou je bij ons willen werken?Omdat je ambitieus bent en die ambitie kwijt wil bij een organisatie met hoge ambities. We werken aan de grootste duurzaamheidsuitdagingen van onze tijd en willen groeien. We hebben een internationaal team waar de voertaal Engels is. Jij kunt hier deel van uitmaken.Je sluit je aan bij een organisatie met een duidelijke visie en identiteit, die is geïntegreerd in alles wat we doen. Ons geloofssysteem: Wij geloven dat complexe duurzame transities kunnen worden gemanaged en dat de kracht van markten en samenwerking essentieel is;Onze ambitie: Wij willen systemisch werken en impact maken;Onze merkbelofte: Wij zijn de thought leader in duurzame markttransformatie en ondersteunen partners in elke stap van hun reis;Onze ideale partners: Wij willen samenwerken met besluitvormers in organisaties die invloed kunnen uitoefenen op hun markt.
We zijn een organisatie waar ieders mening wordt gewaardeerd en waar verantwoordelijkheid niet afhankelijk is van je titel maar van je bekwaamheid. We geloven dat verantwoordelijkheid leidt tot groei, en we zullen je helpen deze groei vorm te geven.Persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling is heel belangrijk voor ons. Alle medewerkers krijgen een mentor die hen begeleidt in hun ontwikkeling en mentees ondersteunt bij het opstellen van een Persoonlijk Ontwikkelingsplan (POP). Jouw POP wordt in elk project besproken om ervoor te zorgen dat je aan je ontwikkelingsgebieden kunt werken. We bieden het hele jaar door interne trainingen aan, evenals een opleidingsbudget voor externe trainingen, en we hebben tweemaal per jaar 360-graden evaluatierondes.Het TransMission domeinJe zult als Strategy Consultant werkzaam zijn in het TransMission domein. Dit domein zet zich in om onze economieën en markten te transformeren tot efficiënte, duurzame, circulaire, regeneratieve, inclusieve en eerlijke systemen. In de komende drie decennia hebben we een cruciale taak voor de boeg, met name in sectoren die momenteel de meest significante nadelige effecten veroorzaken: voedsel en landbouw, energie, bouw en infrastructuur, ICT, logistiek en mobiliteit, textiel, productie en de chemische industrie.Om deze ambitieuze doelstellingen te bereiken, presenteren we TransMission - de missie gedreven transitiebenadering ontwikkeld door NewForesight, Nyenrode Business Universiteit en het Copernicus Instituut voor Duurzame Ontwikkeling.TransMission biedt een praktische en duidelijke standaard voor transitiebeheer waarmee we in staat zijn om: De dynamiek van complexe systemen te analyserenEffectieve strategieën te ontwikkelen voor overgangenDeze overgangen te initiëren, coördineren en versnellen
Voor meer informatie over TransMission kun je hier terecht: https://www.newforesight.com/transmission-institute/De rol van Strategy ConsultantJe komt terecht in een jong, internationaal, divers en zeer gemotiveerd team dat wil groeien. Je zult je richten op de volgende kerntaken.Uitvoeren van projecten voor onze partners: Ongeveer 70% van je tijd zul je bezig zijn met projecten. Dat kan in de rol van projectmanager zijn of als inhoudsdeskundige. Je zult werken aan projecten die structurele, duurzame veranderingen in sectoren bevorderen. Meestal werk je samen met een Senior Advisor en één of twee Analisten.Business Development: Ongeveer 20% van je tijd ben je bezig met het ontwikkelen van nieuwe kansen. Dit kan betekenen dat je aanwezig bent op conferenties en netwerk events om met bestaande relaties te spreken en nieuwe contacten op te doen. Je zoekt naar mogelijke samenwerkingen en plant gesprekken om onze oplossingen te verkopen. Ook schrijf je proposals voor het aangaan van nieuwe projecten.Leren en ontwikkelen: De rest van de tijd, zeg 10%, ben je bezig met het ontwikkelen van je persoonlijke en professionele vaardigheden. Je volgt en geeft trainingen, je ondersteunt medewerkers in hun werkzaamheden en je draagt bij aan de ontwikkeling van de organisatie door interne projecten op te pakken.Wat neem je mee? Masterdiploma in een relevant vakgebied (bijv. Economie, Sociale Wetenschappen, Sustainability).Bewezen staat van dienst in consultancy of in een consultancy rol.Enige ervaring in het leiden van een team van consultants en het vermogen om een team te laten groeien en ontwikkelen.Sterke analytische vaardigheden, met het vermogen om complexe gegevens te verzamelen en interpreteren, trends te identificeren en bruikbare inzichten te trekken.Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden, zowel schriftelijk als mondeling, waardoor effectieve betrokkenheid bij klanten en het leveren van overtuigende presentaties en rapporten mogelijk is.Aantoonbare ervaring in projectmanagement, inclusief het vermogen om interdisciplinaire teams te leiden en projecten binnen het budget en de tijdslijnen te voltooien. Gestructureerd projectmanagement is cruciaal om projecten succesvol af te ronden.Affiniteit met business development en de wil om hier verder in te groeien.Passie voor duurzaamheid, sociale rechtvaardigheid en het stimuleren van positieve verandering in duurzame transities.Vloeiend in het Engels.
Wij bieden een dynamische en inclusieve werkomgeving, waar jouw expertise en innovatieve ideeën zullen bijdragen aan transformerende projecten in verschillende industrieën. Je krijgt de kans om te werken met een divers team van professionals die gepassioneerd zijn over duurzaamheid en maatschappelijke impact.Wat kun je van ons verwachten? Sociale en impact gedreven groep mensen die onder andere maandelijkse borrels hebben (en vaak nog veel vaker) en projectafsluitingen vieren met diner en drankjes.Een jaarcontract op basis van een 40-urige werkweek.Een basissalaris in de range van €3,392,- tot €4,240,-. Het salaris zal gebaseerd zijn op ervaring.Jaarlijkse bonus afhankelijk van bedrijfs- en individuele prestaties (kan variëren van één tot twee maanden).Een vakantietoeslag van 8%.25 vakantiedagen per jaar.Opleidingsbudget van €1,500,- per jaar.OV-treinkaart als je buiten Utrecht woont.Een solide pensioenregeling.Bedrijfslaptop.Telefoonvergoeding.Maandelijkse massagesessie op kantoor.Gesubsidieerde gezamenlijke lunch.Gesubsidieerde jaarlijkse bedrijfsweekendtrip, waar het hele team op een lang weekendtrip ergens in Europa gaat.
Word je hier enthousiast van en ben je klaar om grote duurzaamheidsuitdagingen aan te gaan? Solliciteer dan via de onderstaande link! Sollicitaties worden doorlopend behandeld.

About the job
            
 
Who We Are   BICG is the union of talent from various disciplines applied to think, design, and implement the Company Experience® in organizations. We are economists, journalists, psychologists, sociologists, mathematicians, computer scientists, engineers, and architects, among other specializations. Ultimately, we form a multidisciplinary creative team with a common denominator: the pursuit of excellence in each project, regardless of the challenge involved. With over 20 years of experience, we have found that the most successful organizations are those that pay great attention to the experience of the employees, as well as to the customer experience and those that address these two factors in an integrated manner. Ultimately, we change people´s lives by changing the organizations they work for. Thanks to the implementation of a new Company Experience, we align the company’s goals with the reality that its different audiences live, using most appropriately all the levers available and, especially, seamlessly linking them together. We transform the environment, the processes, and above all, the culture of the company.  We are hiring!  We are looking for a CHANGE MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT based in Madrid.   What you will do You will develop your work supporting the implementation of projects in clients during the complete cycle of our projects. Some of your key activities will be:  Participation in BICG projects in the analysis and diagnosis phase, development of working models, and change management. Follow-up of prospects, business development strategy, and management of customer relations for the coordination, in support of regional management, of projects for new forms of work and evolution of the current and future employee experience. Facilitation of work meetings, production of content and targeted offers, participation in sectoral events, and occasional travel, when necessary, in Spain or Europe. 
If you are fluent in English, you have experience in change management consulting or cultural transformation and you are looking for an opportunity to have an impact in the ways companies work, this role is for you!  What we offer   Permanent contract (we are also open to other types of collaboration, such as freelance work) Diverse and exciting projects in a fun and international company with over 20 years of experience in the design and implementation of modern ways of working strategies and company experience High development potential in an agile and multidisciplinary team with an international mindset and start-up spirit An open culture marked by flat hierarchies and direct communication paths among professionals. Self-responsible work and the possibility to contribute and carry out your own ideas and creativity. An amazing community of humans where everyone finds his/her place and where we take care of each other. Flexible working hours, allowing you to organize your working day according to the needs of your team and client, and to your personal priorities. Laptop, and the possibility to work remotely. Beautiful office near Cuzco. Other benefits such as: Extra days off during Christmas and Easter,  Company Events,  Tax advantages through our Flexible Compensation platform Private health insurance (company level plan): Access to Sanitas plan at a reduced employee cost 
  Your profile:   A university degree in sociology, business sciences, psychology, communication, business administration, anthropology, philosophy, etc. Fluency (C2) in English is a mandatory requirement for this role – please note candidates who do not meet this requirement will not be considered for this role. We are looking for a consultant with around 2-5 years of experience in Change Management. Please note that having previous experience in this field is a mandatory requirement for this job. Experience in internal communication projects is highly valued. Fluency in French or German is highly valued. Excellent use of Windows tools and Office packages, especially PowerPoint and Excel. Willingness to travel is required. 
  What you should bring   Strong sense of ownership and accountability Attention to detail Generosity, autonomy, and can-do attitude – we are a medium-sized company where we need to make things happen, regardless of our position within the team. Strong customer orientation and ability to communicate and bond with the client Ability to be a thinker but also a doer Creativity and eagerness to learn and share knowledge

About the job
            
 
Hello! 👋We are ClimateView, a climate tech and advisory company on the mission to help the world’s cities on their climate transition journey. We offer a unique opportunity to play a key role in tackling climate change at scale. Maybe you are already working with city climate strategy, but have this feeling that you want to make a bigger impact and help more cities reach their goals, faster. With ClimateOS in your hands, this is possible!The positionAs a Climate Strategy Advisor, your primary focus is to help cities succeed in their climate transition. You will meet our customers, the city climate heroes, as a natural part of our sales process when you set them up for success in driving change in their city. You will help them get onboarded on our platform and make sure they use it to its fullest potential, including learning from other cities and to share best practices between cities. As the primary contact for a portfolio of cities you will also be the voice of the customer to our product team, to help us improve and evolve our product. A successful long-term partnership with our customers is your target, and your subject matter expertise combined with your relationship building and result oriented personality is key to success.We believe the best way to meet the challenges we face is with a highly skilled, diverse and passionate team. You will be joining the commercial team and work side by side with inspiring colleagues, such as Orren (Director, Community), Yasmine (Customer Success Manager) to mention a few, and with support from Tomer, our founder. With your base in Sweden, you will join a fully remote and closely-knit team of bright individuals, passionate about their work and our joint mission.Qualifications & Skills  Climate strategy: Minimum 5 years’ of experience from working with climate/sustainability strategy or planning.  Management consultancy: Minimum 3 years of experience from working as a consultant, with responsibility for handling own clients.  Stakeholder Management: Ability to lead, prioritize and work with tight deadlines, as well as coaching clients and adding new perspectives.  Interpersonal skills: Highly skilled relationship builder with strong collaboration skills and coaching skills.  Communication skills: Excellent written and presentation skills in both English and Swedish, and also French or German is a plus. 
About ClimateViewCities are home to the majority of emissions, people and resource use. The climate transition is an enormous challenge. Yet, it’s a chance not just to build green, but great cities. It’s ClimateView’s mission to help cities turn this challenge into an opportunity.The company was founded in Sweden in 2018, and today we are a passionate team of over 40 individuals – from science, policy, consulting and tech – across Europe. Alongside dozens of cities, regional and national authorities, we’ve developed a framework, process and platform for a systematic approach to the transition. In each person we hire we seek commitment and curiosity to deeply understand the ecosystem we are a part of and the challenges we want to help cities to overcome.Interested?We look forward to receiving your application. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible as we consider applications on a rolling basis.

About the job
            
 
We are seeking a brilliant, motivated and committed Senior Insights & Strategy Consultant to join our team in Barcelona.  A Piece of Pie is a global strategy consultancy on a mission to rethink how businesses make decisions. We combine the human sciences with business acumen to arrive at ground-breaking solutions to improve people’s lives.  We are seeking a capable professional willing to grow professionally by supporting our global clients to find new ways to face high risk and challenges with high uncertainty and craft new avenues to help our clients differentiate in today’s competitive business world.  About the role At A Piece of Pie, we work in small, self-directed teams. As a Senior Strategy Consultant, you will be responsible for leading your teams, start to finish, through the successful execution of client projects. This may include scoping and designing the project, supporting the day-to-day work of your team, advising clients, and partnering with a manager to further develop a client relationship.  Responsibilities  Project Management  Independently run mid-to-large scale projects that combine qualitative and quantitative research, data analysis, insight development, and strategy development Thoughtfully design research to fit client objectives and constraints – drawing on ethnography, foresight, and quant methods as appropriate Lead the translation of research into business relevant insight, strategy and value propositions, and further, into brand, product, and service platforms Serve as a trusted advisor to clients Ability navigate the unexpected Attention to detail to ensure quality in everything we do Able to identify and communicate highly actionable insights and strategies Ensure that projects are delivered within scope, on time, at high quality, and within budget 
 Business and Practice   Own the development of pitches and proposals for incoming RFPs Help develop our portfolio of methodologies and best practices. 
 People and Culture   Manage the distribution and pace of project work, balancing output with the wellbeing of your team Create an inspiring and inclusive Team dynamic Coach and develop team members using constructive feedback Foster the values of an intellectually ambitious and humble culture 
 Qualifications  The ideal candidate:   Knowledgeable and passionate about the intersection of business and social sciences Expertise in on cultural insight & foresight, quantitative research 4+ years of experience in a strategy consultancy (e.g. business strategy, innovation strategy, marketing strategy, brand strategy) Including 2+ years independently managing complex, multi-stage projects Including 2+ years in an advisory capacity to senior client stakeholders Including 2+ years of managing small teams multidisciplinary experts and a proven ability to develop, inspire, and collaborate with diverse teams Degree in a social science (e.g. anthropology) or business discipline (e.g. MBA) Deep knowledge of any of the following verticals: healthcare, consumer electronics, tech, finance, luxury, automotive, FMCG Proficiency in qualitative research methods and data management (e.g. ethnography, cultural & semiotic analysis, signal scanning) Expert in quantitative research methods and data management (e.g. surveys, market sizing, social listening), with deep knowledge of advanced statistical techniques (e.g. segmentation analysis, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling, regression analysis, conjoint analysis) English and Spanish fluency and German or French a big plus Able to handle ambiguity and divergent ideas Openness to new methodologies and processes 
 What we offer   Work at the office for the first 3 months, after that you can take advantage of a flexible hybrid work setup Exposure to high-impact projects with leading companies of the world Exciting variety of challenges from exploratory research to business innovation A fast-growing consultancy where your input and expertise plays part in steering the company forward 
 How to Apply  Please submit your resume/CV and cover letter (required) to careers@piecepie.com

About the job

About the job
            
 
Please note: this position is only available for applicants who are proficient in the Dutch language!Heb je passie voor data en media, ben je nieuwsgierig van aard en heb je werkervaring op het gebied research consultancy, data-analyse en insights?
